trainplan.title: New Runner
trainplan.copyWrite: Beginners from walking to jogging. This training course help you become a runner.

trainplan.title: 5K
trainplan.copyWrite: Novice Runners. This course help you improve your running technique.

trainplan.title: 10K
trainplan.copyWrite: Advanced Runners. This course help you improve your aerobic and strength conditioning.

trainplan.title: Half Marathon
trainplan.copyWrite: Half Marathon Race Training. Course to improve your running endurance.

trainplan.title: Full Marathon
trainplan.copyWrite: Full Marathon Race Training. Help predict your time and plan your race strategy.
